data.lyric:
[ti:Paralyzed]
[ar:Sueco]
[al:Paralyzed]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.17]Paralyzed - Sueco
[00:00.41]Lyrics by：Andrew Migliore/Colin Brittain/David Wilson/John Feldmann/William Henry Schultz
[00:01.95]Composed by：Andrew Migliore/Colin Brittain/David Wilson/John Feldmann/William Henry Schultz
[00:03.66]
[00:06.61]She got a big ego you could see it on a telescope
[00:09.69]I'm the same way it's why we always argue back and forth
[00:12.86]I swear she my poison at the same time my antidote
[00:16.21]She the noose around my neck
[00:17.50]I couldn't ask for a better rope ayy
[00:19.51]
[00:20.39]You're like a timebomb ticking away
[00:22.97]Thirty seconds 'til you blow up right in my face
[00:26.13]I can't find one good reason to stay
[00:29.01]
[00:29.64]So why do I hate when you're walking away
[00:32.58]You got me paralyzed
[00:37.09]
[00:38.86]Go ahead baby take my life
[00:44.40]
[00:44.91]'Cause I don't wanna live if I'm living without you
[00:48.07]Suicide love take me out if you have to
[00:51.02]
[00:51.76]You got me paralyzed
[00:57.32]
[00:57.89]She a dime keeper and my pocket like some loose change
[01:01.02]Just swervin' on the 101 back to your place
[01:04.15]One wrong turn fantasize 'bout the great escape
[01:07.35]Hands off the wheel close my eyes let me meditate
[01:11.61]You're like a timebomb ticking away
[01:14.13]Thirty seconds 'til you blow up right in my face
[01:17.29]I can't find one good reason to stay
[01:20.63]So why do I hate when you're walking away
[01:23.70]You got me paralyzed
[01:28.29]
[01:30.23]Go ahead baby take my life
[01:35.53]
[01:36.17]'Cause I don't wanna live if
[01:37.60]I'm living without you
[01:39.32]Suicide love take me out if you have to
[01:42.22]
[01:43.05]You got me paralyzed
[01:48.50]
[01:50.04]You left your c*****e on my nightstand
[01:53.17]Your favorite necklace is my right hand
[01:56.34]Yet you were never apart of the plan
[01:59.60]And it was over before it began
[02:02.07]You got me paralyzed I'm paralyzed
[02:08.13]
[02:08.64]Go ahead baby take my life
[02:12.14]Just take my life
[02:13.98]
[02:14.54]'Cause I don't wanna live if I'm living without you
[02:17.68]Suicide love take me out if you have to
[02:20.56]
[02:21.35]You got me paralyzed I'm paralyzed
[02:27.21]
[02:31.08]I'm paralyzed
[02:33.86]
[02:37.37]I'm paralyzed
data.trans:
[ti:Paralyzed]
[ar:Sueco]
[al:Paralyzed]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.17]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.41]//
[00:01.95]//
[00:03.66]
[00:06.61]她很自我 你拿个望远镜就能看清楚
[00:09.69]我也一样 所以我们总是翻来覆去地争吵
[00:12.86]我发誓她是我的毒药 同时也是我的解药
[00:16.21]她是缠绕我脖颈的绳子
[00:17.50]我找不到比这更好的绳子
[00:19.51]
[00:20.39]你就像颗定时炸弹 滴答滴答响
[00:22.97]还有三十秒 你就会在我面前爆炸
[00:26.13]我找不到一个很好的理由留下
[00:29.01]
[00:29.64]那你离开我的时候 我又为什么会万般不愿
[00:32.58]你让我无力反抗
[00:37.09]
[00:38.86]来吧 宝贝 取走我的性命
[00:44.40]
[00:44.91]因为要是没有你 我就不想再活下去
[00:48.07]自杀式的爱情 如果你别无他法 那就把我带走
[00:51.02]
[00:51.76]你让我无力反抗
[00:57.32]
[00:57.89]她是个守财奴 而我的钱包里只有一点零钱
[01:01.02]只是绕了个圈 又回到你的身边
[01:04.15]一次错误的选择 幻想能有一场大逃亡
[01:07.35]双手脱离方向盘 闭上眼睛 让我沉思片刻
[01:11.61]你就像颗定时炸弹 滴答滴答响
[01:14.13]还有三十秒 你就会在我面前爆炸
[01:17.29]我找不到一个很好的理由留下
[01:20.63]那你离开我的时候 我又为什么会万般不愿
[01:23.70]你让我无力反抗
[01:28.29]
[01:30.23]来吧 宝贝 取走我的性命
[01:35.53]
[01:36.17]因为要是没有你
[01:37.60]我就不想再活下去
[01:39.32]自杀式的爱情 如果你别无他法 那就把我带走
[01:42.22]
[01:43.05]你让我无力反抗
[01:48.50]
[01:50.04]你把你的**落在了我的床头柜上
[01:53.17]你最喜欢的项链就在我右手拿着
[01:56.34]然而你从来没有参与过我的计划
[01:59.60]而且还没开始就已经结束
[02:02.07]你让我无力反抗 我已无力反抗
[02:08.13]
[02:08.64]来吧 宝贝 取走我的性命
[02:12.14]来取走我的性命
[02:13.98]
[02:14.54]因为要是没有你 我就不想再活下去
[02:17.68]自杀式的爱情 如果你别无他法 那就把我带走
[02:20.56]
[02:21.35]你让我无力反抗 我已无力反抗
[02:27.21]
[02:31.08]我已无力反抗
[02:33.86]
[02:37.37]我已无力反抗
